content.question: In the period circa 1750 to 1900, revolutions occurred in many parts of the world. Develop an argument that evaluates the extent to which revolutions led to cultural or social changes during this period.

frqParts.text: In the period circa 1750 to 1900, revolutions occurred in many parts of the world. Develop an argument that evaluates the extent to which revolutions led to cultural or social changes during this period.

topic.text: 5.2: Nationalism and Revolutions in the Period from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
